mapper.select: SELECT A.DEAL_NO , A.DEAL_DT , (SELECT PN_IMG FROM TBL011 B WHERE B.PN_MDL_NO = A.PN_MDL_NO AND B.PN_STOR = A.PN_STOR) AS PN_IMG , (SELECT CONCAT(PN_MKR,' ',PN_MDL_NM) FROM TBL011 B WHERE B.PN_MDL_NO = A.PN_MDL_NO AND B.PN_STOR = A.PN_STOR) AS PN_MDL_NM , A.MNT_CARR , A.PN_REG_DIS , (SELECT PN_MNT_RT_NM FROM TBL010 C WHERE C.PN_MNT_RT_NO = A.PN_MNT_RT_NO) AS PN_MNT_RT_NM FROM TBL006 A WHERE A.CL_MBR_ID = #{email}
